S03n244:4: bodhisattvaḥ kila mahāsattvaḥ kasmiṃścinmahati brāhmaṇakule guṇābhyāsamāhātmyādativṛddhayaśasi pratiniyatasamṛddhiguṇe rājasatkṛte daivatasaṃmate lokasya janma pratileme |
S03n244:5: kālānāmatyayenābhivṛddhaḥ kṛtasaṃskārakarmā śrutaguṇābhyāsādacireṇaiva vidvatsadassu prakāśanāmā babhūva |
S03n244:8: atha sa mahātmā pravrajyākṛtaparicayatvātpūrvajanmasu svabhyastadharmasaṃjñatvātprajñāvadātamatitvacca na gehe ratimupalebhe |
S03n244:9: sa kāmān vigrahavivādamadavairasyaprācuryādrājacaurodakadahanavipriyadāyādasādhāraṇatvādatṛptijanakatvādanekadoṣāyatanatvācca saviṣamivānnamātmakāmaḥ parityajya saṃhṛtakeśaśmaśruśobhaḥ kāṣāyavivarṇavāsāḥ parityaktagṛhaveṣavibhramaḥ pravrajyāvinayaniyamaśriyamaśiśriyam |
S03n244:11: atha bodhisattvastapovanānugamanavyavasāyamasya vidtvā tapovanādhyāsanāyogyatāṃ ca strīsaukumāryasyāvocadenāṃ-bhadre darśitastvayāyamasmadanurāgasvabhāvaḥ |
S03n244:13: yatraiva tvanyāḥ pravrajitāḥ prativasanti tatra bhavatyāstābhireva sārdha pratirūpaṃ vastuṃ syāt |
S03n244:16: niketahīnā yatayo vasanti yatraiva cāstaṃ ravirabhyupaiti ||2 ||
S03n244:18: nivartituṃ tena matiṃ kuruṣva ko'rthastabānena paribhrameṇa ||3 ||
S03n244:21: kimityevaṃ prapadyeya duḥkha tava ca vipriyam ||4 ||
S03n244:22: yattu naiva samarthāsmi vartituṃ rahitā tvayā |
S03n244:24: iti sā dvitrirapyucyamānāyadā necchati sma nivartitum,
S03n244:26: sa tayānugamyamānaścakravāka iva cakravākyā grāmanagaranigamānanuvicaran kadācitkṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ kasmiṃścitpravivikte śrimati nānātarugahanopaśobhite ghanapracchāye kṛtopakāra iva kvacitkvaciddinakarakiraṇacandrakairnānukusumarajo'vakīrṇadharaṇitale śucau vanoddeśe dhyānavidhimanuṣṭhāya sāyānhasamaye vyutthāya samādheḥ pāṃsukūlāni sivyati sma |
S03n244:27: sāpi pravrajitā tasyaiva nātīdūre vṛkṣamūlamupaśobhayamānā devateva svena vapuṣaḥ prabhāveṇa virājamānā tadupadiṣṭena manaskāravidhinā dhyāyati sma |
S03n244:28: atha tatratyo rājā vasantakālajanitābhyadhikakisalayaśobhāni bhramadbhramaramadhukarīgaṇopakūjitāni pramattakokilakulakilakilāni prahasitakamalakuvalayālaṃkṛtābhilaṣaṇiyajalāśayāni vividhakusumasaṃmodagandhādhivāsitasukhapavanānyupavanāni samanuvicaraṃstaṃ deśamupajagāma |
S03n244:33: atha sa rājā savinayamabhigamya bodhisattvaṃ kṛtapratisaṃmodanakathastatraikānte nvaṣidata |
S03n244:34: sa tāṃ pravrajitāmatimanoharadarśanāmabhivīkṣya tasyā rūpaśobhayā samākṣipyamāgahṛdayo nūnamasyeyaṃ sahadharmacāriṇītyavetya lolasvabhavatvāttadapaharaṇopāyaṃ vimamarśa |
S03n244:37: tasya buddhirabhavat-tapaḥprabhāvamasya jñātvā śakyamatra tadyuktaṃ pravartituṃ nānyathā |
S03n244:39: atha vītarāgaḥ syānmandāpekṣo vā tato'smin saṃbhāvyaṃ tapaḥprabhavamāhātmyam |
S03n244:40: iti vicintya sa rājā tapahprabhāvajijñāsayā bodhisattvaṃ hitaiṣivaduvāca-bhoḥ pravrajita pracuradhūrtasāhasikapuruṣe'smiṃlloke na yuktamatrabhavato nirākrandeṣu vaneṣvevaṃ pratirūpayānayā sahadharmacāriṇyā saha vicaritum |
S03n244:41: asyāṃ hi te kaścidaparādhyamāno niyatasmānapyupakrośabhājanīkuryāt | paśya
S03n244:42: evaṃ vivikteṣu tapaḥkṛśaṃ tvāṃ dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ paribhūya kaścit |
S03n244:43: imāṃ prasahyāpaharedyadā te śokātparaṃ kiṃ bata tatra kuryāḥ ||9 ||
S03n244:45: vasatviyaṃ tena janānta eva strīsaṃnikarṣeṇa ca kiṃ yatīnām ||10 ||
S03n244:48: syādatra me yaḥ pratikūlavartī darpodbhavādapratisaṃkhyayā vā |
S03n244:49: vyaktaṃ na mucyeta sa jīvato me dhārādhanasyeva dhanasya reṇuḥ ||11 ||
S03n244:50: atha sa rājā tīvrāpekṣo'yamasyāṃ tapaḥprabhāvahīna ityavajñāya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ tadapāyanirāśaṅkaḥ kāmarāgavaśagaḥ strīsaṃdarśanādhikṛtān puruṣān samādideśa-gacchataitāṃ pravrajitāmantaḥpuraṃ praveśayateti |
S03n244:51: tadupaśrutya sā pravrajitā vyālamṛgābhidruteva vanamṛgī bhayaviṣādaviklavamukhī bāṣpoparudhyamānanayanā gadgadāyamānakaṇṭhī tattadārtivaśādvilalāpa-
S03n244:53: sa eva yasya tvanayābahuḥ syādākrandanaṃ kasya nu tena kāryam ||12 ||
S03n244:54: bhraṣṭādhikārā bata lokapālā na santi vā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatā vā |
S03n244:55: na trātumārtāniti ye sayatnā dharmo'pi manye śrutimātrameva ||13 ||
S03n244:56: kiṃ vā surairme bhagavān yadevaṃ madbhāgadheyairdhṛtamauna eva |
S03n244:59: itthaṃgatāyāmapi tasya maunaṃ tathāpi jīvāmi ca mandabhāgyā ||15 ||
S03n244:61: ārteṣu kārūṇyamayī pravṛttistapodhanānāṃ kimayaṃ na mārgaḥ ||16 ||
S03n244:62: śaṅke tavādyāpi tadeva citte nivartyamānāsmi na yannivṛttā |
S03n244:63: tavāpriyeṇāpi mayepsitaṃ yadātmapriyaṃhā tadidaṃ kathaṃ me ||17 ||
S03n244:64: iti tāṃ pravrajitā karunavilāpākranditaruditamātraparāyaṇāṃ te rājasamādiṣṭāḥ puruṣā yānamāropya paśyata eva tasya mahasattvasyāntaḥpurāya ninyuḥ |
S03n244:65: bodhisattvo'pi pratisaṃkhyānabalātpratinudya krodhabalaṃ tathaiba pāṃsukūlāni niḥsaṃkṣobhaḥ praśāntacetāḥ sīvyati sma |
S03n244:69: taddarśaya svāṃ bhujayo ruṣaṃ vā tejastapaḥsaṃśrayasaṃbhṛtaṃ vā |
S03n244:72: yo'bhūnmamātra pratikūlavartī vispandamāno'pi sa me na muktaḥ |
S03n244:73: prasahya nītaḥ praśamaṃ mayā tu tasmādyathārthaiva mama pratijñā ||20 ||
S03n244:74: atha sa rājā tena bodhisattvasya dhairyātiśayavyañjakena praśamena samutpāditatapasviguṇasaṃbhāvanaścintāmāpede-anyadevānena brāhmaṇenābhisaṃdhāya bhāṣitam,
S03n244:76: ko'nyastavābhūtpratikūlavartī yo visphuranneva na te vimuktaḥ |
S03n244:77: reṇuḥ samudyanniva toyadena kaścopanītaḥ praśamaṃ tvayātra ||21 ||
S03n244:79: jāte na dṛśyate yasminnajāte sādhu dṛśyate |
S03n244:80: abhūnme sa na muktaśca krodhaḥ svāśrayabādhanaḥ ||22 ||
S03n244:85: yenābhibhūtaḥ kuśalaṃ jahāti prāptādapi bhraśyata eva cārthāt |
S03n244:89: dahanamiva vijṛmbhamāṇaraudraṃ śamayati yo hṛdayajvaraṃ na roṣam |
S03n244:90: laghurayamiti hīyate'sya kīrtiḥ kumudasakhīva śaśiprabhā prabhāte ||27 ||
S03n244:92: vikasati niyamena tasya kīrtiḥ śaśina ivābhinavasya maṇḍalaśrīḥ ||28 ||
S03n244:95: saroṣaśalye hṛdaye ca duḥkhaṃ mahārhaśayyāṅkagato'pi śete ||29 ||
S03n244:104: ato na muktaḥ kopo me visphurannapi cetasi |
S03n244:106: atha sa rājā tena tasyādbhutena praśamaguṇena hṛdayagrāhakeṇa ca vacasābhiprasāditamatiruvāca--
S03n244:117: evaṃ cobhayorarthaṃ caratyakrodhana ityevamādiṣu kṣamānuśaṃsāpratisaṃyukteṣu sūtreṣu vācyam |
